name: Curse of King Uroboros
description:
Play as an unfortunate soul in this action platformer to escape King Uroboros's Curse: every time you fight one of the King's minions, a ghost of your past appears every five seconds to repeat your actions. Kill the King's monsters to showdown with Uroboros himself. 

Face off against...

  • Icetopus - The Bone-Chilling Octopus with crystal daggers and platform generating ice orbs
  • Burnataur - Half Man, Half Beast, Half Fire!
  • King Uroboros - The Slithering Lord who you swore revenge on

How To Play:

  • Move with A/D 
  • Jump with W/Space
  • Drop through Wooden Platforms with S 
  • Aim with the Mouse 
  • Shoot with Left Click

Didn't make the LD47 cut in time:

  • Venus Die Trap - A killer plant that will wrap your platforms in sharp vines
  • Volture - The Shocking Death Bird with electric diving attacks

This game was made in 48 hours by one person for the Ludum Dare 47 Game Jam / Compo category, themed "Stuck in a Loop"
